title: Fruit and Yogurt Smoothie Recipe
description: This yogurt smoothie recipe blends strawberries, banana, pineapple juice, orange juice, and plain yogurt together for a delicious, refreshing drink.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Drinks Recipes Smoothie Recipes Strawberry Fruit and Yogurt Smoothie 4.7 (108) 81 Reviews 23 Photos This yogurt smoothie recipe is delicious! You may substitute the strawberries for any other berries or fruit. Submitted by Sarah Updated on April 5, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 23 23 23 23 Prep Time: 5 mins Total Time: 5 mins Servings: 2 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 2 servings 1 cup strawberries 1 banana ½ cup yogurt ¼ cup pineapple juice 1 ½ teaspoons white sugar 1 teaspoon orange juice 1 teaspoon milk Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Combine strawberries, banana, yogurt, pineapple juice, sugar, orange juice, and milk in a blender. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Blend until smooth. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 254 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 146 Calories 1g Fat 31g Carbs 5g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 2 Calories 146 % Daily Value * Total Fat 1g 2% Saturated Fat 1g 4% Cholesterol 4mg 1% Sodium 45mg 2% Total Carbohydrate 31g 11% Dietary Fiber 3g 11% Total Sugars 22g Protein 5g 9% Vitamin C 56mg 62% Calcium 132mg 10% Iron 1mg 3% Potassium 519mg 11% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. The only thing I might add would be to made more the suggested, because of small portions. 03 of 23 Photo by  beverly 06/12/2021 Delicious! 04 of 23 Photo by  beverly 06/12/2021 Delicious! 05 of 23 Photo by  Rita Christakos 10/27/2020 06 of 23 Photo by  Tristan Mich 06/23/2020 07 of 23 Photo by  Kristina Hall 05/29/2020 08 of 23 Photo by  Delayne Welch 04/25/2020 09 of 23 Photo by  thatAfro 04/11/2020 I tried it with sugar was to sweet but without the sugar. instructions: Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Combine strawberries, banana, yogurt, pineapple juice, sugar, orange juice, and milk in a blender. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Blend until smooth. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios
